results.summary: Construction of Cerkezkoy Intermodal Terminal (IMT) Project
results.content: Construction of Cerkezkoy Intermodal Terminal (IMT) Project

description: This is construction of a rail freight terminal at the Cerkezkoy junction area where the high speed rail and the existing conventional line intersects. The capacity will be 80,000 TEU per year. The facility will have warehousing, transshipment with access  to road and rail services.
title: Construction of Cerkezkoy Intermodal Terminal (IMT) Project

results.summary: Strengthening Intermodal Transport Services in Turkish Railway Sector
results.content: Strengthening Intermodal Transport Services in Turkish Railway Sector

description: The purpose of the contract is to develop the strategy for rail freight and intermodal transport operations including identification and development of freight transport corridors in Turkey. The Contract shall also include identification of necessary infrastructure connections and capacity building in order to improve solutions for the intermodal transport operations.The results of the Contract shall include, but not necessarily be limited to:• Assessment of the situation in the sector,• Exploring prospects for intermodal transport development,• Action Plan for developing intermodal freight transport,• Capacity building and visibility.
title: Strengthening Intermodal Transport Services in Turkish Railway Sector

results.summary: Technical Assistance Unit - Support to Criminal Justice Reform in Ethiopia
results.content: Technical Assistance Unit - Support to Criminal Justice Reform in Ethiopia

description: Ethiopia is currently engaged in sweeping reforms, including of the criminal justice sector. The subject of this contract is to establish, staff and implement a Technical Assistance Unit to provide technical assistance to the implementation of the programme in support to Criminal Justice Reform in Ethiopia. The programme is intended to run for 72 months from the date of entry into force of the financing agreement. The contractor will be responsible for the day-to-day implementation and management of the programme, the management of a short-term expert facility, and is expected to provide a technical assistance team that will include a team leader/senior criminal justice reform expert; senior prosecutions and policing expert; senior monitoring and evaluation expert; financial management expert; and administrative support.
title: Technical Assistance Unit - Support to Criminal Justice Reform in Ethiopia

results.summary: Supply of rabies vaccines
results.content: Supply of rabies vaccines

description: The subject of the contract is the supply, delivery, unloading, storage, testing and inspection (quantity and quality control of the vaccines), transport and aerial distribution (on the whole territory of the Beneficiary country) of vaccines for oral vaccination of wild animals against rabies and obtaining of all necessary permits and licences in regards to this contract. The areal distribution will be performed in one campaign in spring 2022.The territory for vaccination shall be the whole territory of the Beneficiary country excluding water surfaces and dense urban settlements, which has been evaluated to about 25.000 km2. The vaccine bait density will be 20 baits per 1 km2.
title: Supply of rabies vaccines

results.summary: Supervision of the Modernization and Rehabilitation of the Railway Section Niš - Brestovac
results.content: Supervision of the Modernization and Rehabilitation of the Railway Section Niš - Brestovac

description: The purpose of this contract is to provide supervision services according to the relevant national legislation, and to fulfil duties of the 'Engineer' as specified in the FIDIC conditions of contract, for the construction works of the modernization and rehabilitation of all sub-systems of app. 23 km (app. 34 km including tracks in stations and two track sections) of the electrified single-track public railway line from Niš to Brestovac as a part of Corridor X.The additional information regarding the description of the contract is stated at section 29. Of the Additional information about the contract notice.
title: Supervision of the Modernization and Rehabilitation of the Railway Section Niš - Brestovac

results.summary: EU-VN Enhancing Economic Governance Project: strengthen doing-business environment, planning management, public investment and public procurement
results.content: EU-VN Enhancing Economic Governance Project: strengthen doing-business environment, planning management, public investment and public procurement

description: The European Commission and the Socialist Republic of Viet Nam signed the Financing Agreement for the implementation of the EU-Viet Nam Enhancing Economic Governance Programme in December 2021. The programme has two project components providing technical assistance to the Ministry of Planning and Investment (MPI) and the Ministry of Finance (MOF) respectively. The purpose of this procurement is to procure services for the implementation of the technical assistance project with the MPI.
title: EU-VN Enhancing Economic Governance Project: strengthen doing-business environment, planning management, public investment and public procurement

results.summary: Technical Assistance for Institutional Capacity Building for the Implementation of Employment, Education and Social Policies Sectoral Operational Programme (EESP SOP) under IPA-II – Third Phase
results.content: Technical Assistance for Institutional Capacity Building for the Implementation of Employment, Education and Social Policies Sectoral Operational Programme (EESP SOP) under IPA-II – Third Phase

description: The purpose of  this  contract  is  to improve  further the  capacity  of DEUFA and  potential  and  actual beneficiaries, in order to support them in fulfilling their functions related to the IPA and future EU Structural Funds  implementations. To  this  aim, DEUFA will  be  supported so  that  EESP  SOP  and    financial cooperation with  the  EU are  both  managed  effectively  and this serves  as  a  valuable  preparation  for  the future  management  of the ESF. Also,  the  capacity  of  institutions  for  policy  design,  effective  use  of  IPA funds, Acquis alignment and conducting evaluation and thematic monitoring activities will be increased. Apart from these, it will be provided assistance in increasing the capacity of potential/actual beneficiaries on project preparation, implementation and management. Besides, awareness of general public about the opportunities provided by EESP SOP and about its implementations and outcomes will be increased.
title: Technical Assistance for Institutional Capacity Building for the Implementation of Employment, Education and Social Policies Sectoral Operational Programme (EESP SOP) under IPA-II – Third Phase

results.summary: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance
results.content: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance

description: Service Contract to facilitate the operationalisation of the EU-Japan Green Alliance.  Activities will focus on supporting policy dialogue and practical cooperation on shared policy priorities.  Expected outputs will focus on enhancing EU/member state climate and environmental diplomacy and outreach in Japan;  supporting cooperation with Japan to energy transition; strengthening EU-Japan bilateral cooperation, multilateral efforts including business exchanges to drive uptake of low carbon technologies, circular economy and resource efficiency, biodiversity protection and restoration frameworks, and instruments fighting pollution; enhancing EU-Japan exchanges on development of climate policies including carbon pricing, collaboration on research and development supporting green transition and cooperation on sustainable finance; and supporting cooperation and exchanges on best practices between EU and Japanese cities on green smart city innovations.
title: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance

results.summary: Support to the permanent structure of the EU-Africa Business Forum
results.content: Support to the permanent structure of the EU-Africa Business Forum

description: Initiative to support public-private dialogue and business cooperation within the framework of the EU-Africa Business Forum (EABF). The overall objective of EABF is to boost EU-Africa trade integration and sustainable investment flows with a focus on sectors covered by the Global Gateway and flagship actions of the EU-Africa Summit. The service contract aims to reinforce EU-Africa public-private dialogue and cooperation, reinforce business-to-business dialogue and cooperation, and to contribute to value chain regional level dialogues between the EU and Africa. Building on past EABF events and dialogues, a permanent EABF structure is to be established within this contract.
title: Support to the permanent structure of the EU-Africa Business Forum

results.summary: EU 4 Public Administration – technical assistance to Montenegro in support of public services provision and human resources management
results.content: EU 4 Public Administration – technical assistance to Montenegro in support of public services provision and human resources management

description: The overall objective is to assist the Government of Montenegro and in particular the Ministry of Public Administration to effectively and efficiently implement the PAR strategy 2022-2026 and its Action Plan. The focus will be on supporting public authorities in providing high quality services to citizens and businesses, including their simplification and digitization, as well as on supporting the establishment of a Human Resources planning and management system based on identified needs, de-politicization and merit based recruitment procedure.
title: EU 4 Public Administration – technical assistance to Montenegro in support of public services provision and human resources management

results.summary: Support for programme management and implementation of the OPSYS ecosystem
results.content: Support for programme management and implementation of the OPSYS ecosystem

description: Support for the management and implementation of OPSYS information system in the framework of the digital transformation of DG INTPA, DG NEAR and FPI. The contract encompasses the following areas: Business process management, Change management, Programme management  and Project implementation.
title: Support for programme management and implementation of the OPSYS ecosystem

results.summary: Construction of Zenica Court
results.content: Construction of Zenica Court

description: This action will contribute to strengthened rule of law in BiH through support to enhancing the effectiveness and integrity of judiciary and law enforcement agencies in general. The target areas are improving the effectiveness, integrity and professionalism of the governmental institutions ensuring the rule of law, access to justice and prevention of and fight against corruption.By modernizing the spatial conditions and improving working environment an overall service to the citizens is to be improved. In order to modernize existing facilities of the Municipal Court in Zenica, both reconstruction and the construction are to be combined in this project. The new structure is designed as reinforced concrete skeleton with slab foundation and prefabricated partition walls. Also, mayor reconstruction of the basement and the ground floor as well as replacement of the façade of the building in function is planned.
title: Construction of Zenica Court

results.summary: Supply of IT Hardware, Training Equipment, E-Learning Platforms and Audit Management Information System for PFM Oversight Institutions in Ghana
results.content: Supply of IT Hardware, Training Equipment, E-Learning Platforms and Audit Management Information System for PFM Oversight Institutions in Ghana

description: Supply, delivery and installation of training equipment and Laptops for the Parliamentary Training Institute (PTI), Laptops for Ghana Audit Service (GAS), Personal Computers for the Internal Audit Agency (IAA), web-based internal Audit Management Information System to the Internal Audit Agency (IAA) and e-learning platform to the Parliamentary Training Institute(PTI) and Ghana Audit Service (GAS). Based on needs assessment the items describe above deem necessary to improve public finance management.
title: Supply of IT Hardware, Training Equipment, E-Learning Platforms and Audit Management Information System for PFM Oversight Institutions in Ghana

results.summary: IPA 2022 Multi-beneficiary statistical cooperation programme
results.content: IPA 2022 Multi-beneficiary statistical cooperation programme

description: The objective of the contract is to prepare the statistical authorities in Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kosovo(1), North Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia and Türkiye (IPA Beneficiaries) for future EU membership by aligning their present methodologies and practices with the statistical acquis and integrating them into the European Statistical System.(1)This designation is without prejudice to positions on status, and is in line with UNSCR 1244/1999 and the ICJ Opinion on the Kosovo declaration of independence.
title: IPA 2022 Multi-beneficiary statistical cooperation programme

results.summary: Technical Assistance to the Public Accountability and Service Delivery Programme (PASEDE)
results.content: Technical Assistance to the Public Accountability and Service Delivery Programme (PASEDE)

description: The EU is supporting Public Finance Management (PFM) reforms in Kenya through the EUR 26 million Public Accountability and Service Delivery (PASEDE) budget support programme. The purpose of this service contract is to provide technical assistance and capacity building support to the Public Finance Management (PFM) Reform Secretariat and stakeholders involved in the implementation of Kenya PFM Reform Strategy (2018-2023).
title: Technical Assistance to the Public Accountability and Service Delivery Programme (PASEDE)

results.summary: EU 4 Public Finance Management (PFM) in Montenegro
results.content: EU 4 Public Finance Management (PFM) in Montenegro

description: The overall objective is to assist the Government of Montenegro and in particular the Ministry of Finance to effectively and efficiently implement the PFM strategy 2022-2026 and its Action Plan. The focus will be on increased transparency public finance (open data and transparency of the state budget); digitalization of public finance system; enhanced managerial accountability and delegation of authority; strategic policy planning linked to Medium Term Budgetary Framework and further development of programme-based budgeting.
title: EU 4 Public Finance Management (PFM) in Montenegro

results.summary: Technical Assistance for “METU Digital Innovation Centre”
results.content: Technical Assistance for “METU Digital Innovation Centre”

description: Please see II.2.4
title: Technical Assistance for “METU Digital Innovation Centre”

results.summary: Technical assistance (TA) to enhance value addition, market access and competitiveness of private sector in Namibia in order to promote trade under the EPA
results.content: Technical assistance (TA) to enhance value addition, market access and competitiveness of private sector in Namibia in order to promote trade under the EPA

description: The services will involve provision of technical advice, analysis, training and capacity building in the following thematic areas:•         Legal and regulatory aspects: This includes among others regulations and a masterplan for Special Economic Zones, investment and export promotion, review of domestic foreign trade legislation and gap analysis, a national standardisation strategy relating to products and production processes.•         Support to value chain development for sectors such as cosmetics, charcoal, gemstones, seafood, mineral beneficiation.•         Enhancing information for policy making, including surveys, statistics, input-output matrices, economic analysis.•         Business and product development: This includes market research, business advisory services (entrepreneurship and management training), product competitiveness and development, B2B networking and facilitation.Beneficiaries: Ministry of Trade, other public and private sector org.
title: Technical assistance (TA) to enhance value addition, market access and competitiveness of private sector in Namibia in order to promote trade under the EPA

results.summary: Construction works for five regional offices of the Kosovo Food and Veterinary Agency (KFVA)
results.content: Construction works for five regional offices of the Kosovo Food and Veterinary Agency (KFVA)

description: The purpose of this project is construction of a five regional offices of the Kosovo Food and Veterinary Agency (KFVA) in Prishtina, Prizren, Peja ,Gjilan and Mitrovica.
title: Construction works for five regional offices of the Kosovo Food and Veterinary Agency (KFVA)

results.summary: IPA 2020 EU4PFM treasury software
results.content: IPA 2020 EU4PFM treasury software

description: The aim of the project is to contribute for full introduction of program based budgeting so that link between economic policy priorities and strategic/medium-term planning and budgeting is strengthened. Method for this is new software for budget planning and reporting in program format and related training programme.
title: IPA 2020 EU4PFM treasury software

results.summary: Assistance technique pour l’opérationnalisation du système de vérification de la légalité et appui à l’aménagement
results.content: Assistance technique pour l’opérationnalisation du système de vérification de la légalité et appui à l’aménagement

description: Cette assistance technique a pour objectif de contribuer au renforcement et à l’amélioration de la gouvernance forestière en faveur d'une gestion durable et plus transparente des ressources naturelles en République du Congo en (i) contribuant à l’opérationnalisation du Système de vérification de la légalité (SVL) de l’APV FLEGT en général, et du Système informatisé de vérification de la légalité (SIVL) en particulier et (ii) appuyant l’aménagement simplifié des petites et moyennes superficies forestières.
title: Assistance technique pour l’opérationnalisation du système de vérification de la légalité et appui à l’aménagement

results.summary: Development of the Master Plan of Agglomerations in BiH for the Effective Planning and Implementation of EU UWWTD in Bosnia and Herzegovina
results.content: Development of the Master Plan of Agglomerations in BiH for the Effective Planning and Implementation of EU UWWTD in Bosnia and Herzegovina

description: Project purpose is to accelerate water sector reforms in BiH through the preparation of the technical baseline documents aimed at effective planning and implementation of EU WFD and EU UWWTD in BiH. The following results are envisaged:• Result 1. Master Plans of Agglomerations in BiH are prepared in sufficient detail that can fully support the preparation of new DISP and APIDs for the implementation of UWWTD in BiH.• Result 2. DSIP and APIDs for the implementation of UWWTD in BiH.• Result 3. Capacity Building Programme related to the implementation of the EU UWWTD in BiH.
title: Development of the Master Plan of Agglomerations in BiH for the Effective Planning and Implementation of EU UWWTD in Bosnia and Herzegovina

results.summary: Accompagnement au processus de mise à niveau de la sécurité routière par l’élaboration de la stratégie du contrôle du transport professionnel et l’introduction du tachygraphe numérique
results.content: Accompagnement au processus de mise à niveau de la sécurité routière par l’élaboration de la stratégie du contrôle du transport professionnel et l’introduction du tachygraphe numérique

description: Le marché vise (I) à assister à l’élaboration d’un projet de stratégie du contrôle du transport professionnel visant l’amélioration des indicateurs de la sécurité routière et la concurrence loyale dans le secteur, en soutenant le processus de convergence vers l’UE (II) à accompagner l’introduction du tachygraphe numérique. Les activités porteront sur (I) l’élaboration d’une stratégie de contrôle routier, (II) renforcement du cadre juridique (dont le respect du temps de conduite repos des conducteurs professionnels sur route, la mise en place du système du tachygraphe numérique et les projets de normes concernant le tachygraphe numérique (III) développement du réseau d’ateliers agréés pour le tachygraphe numérique, (IV) la mise en place des systèmes d’information nécessaires à l’opérationnalisation du tachygraphe numérique et de la gestion de la délivrance des cartes tachygraphiques et leur sécurité et (V) renforcement capacités parties prenantes.
title: Accompagnement au processus de mise à niveau de la sécurité routière par l’élaboration de la stratégie du contrôle du transport professionnel et l’introduction du tachygraphe numérique

results.summary: SUPPORT TO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EU-JAPAN CONNECTIVITY PARTNERSHIP
results.content: SUPPORT TO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EU-JAPAN CONNECTIVITY PARTNERSHIP

description: This service is to increase the operationalisation and visibility of the EU-Japan Connectivity Partnership through the development of an enabling environment to launch new initiatives which will facilitate the implementation of the Partnership, including but not limited to: Establishment of platforms of cooperation among the main stakeholders, including a portal to bring together investors and connectivity projects. Creating better awareness and cooperation among the EU-Japan business and financial services and promoting their cooperation in third countries in the four pillars of connectivity (digital, transport, energy and human connectivity). Enhance the implementation of MoU between EIB and JICA (Japan International Cooperation Agency), JBIC (Japan Bank for International Cooperation) and NEXI (Nippon Export Investment Insurance) and in general cooperation between financial institutions.
title: SUPPORT TO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EU-JAPAN CONNECTIVITY PARTNERSHIP

results.summary: Support to Green Electrons and Molecules' (GEM) development in the Southern Neighbourhood
results.content: Support to Green Electrons and Molecules' (GEM) development in the Southern Neighbourhood

description: The overall objective of the MED-GEM project is to support the creation and the operationalisation of a Mediterranean Green Electrons & Molecules (GEM) Network in the Southern Neighbourhood region by convening dialogue and collaborative activities between key stakeholders such as policy makers, industry (public and private), IFI’s, civils society, research entities, in order to accelerate the GEM market development and increase public awareness on the imperative need for an accelerated clean energy transition.
title: Support to Green Electrons and Molecules' (GEM) development in the Southern Neighbourhood

results.summary: Support to CEPA monitoring, implementation and communication
results.content: Support to CEPA monitoring, implementation and communication

description: The project will support the Government of Armenia in its reform process, CEPA implementation and strategic communication. Moreover, the project will provide support to the EU Delegation in Armenia in programming and communication and additional support will be provided to civil service organisations in monitoring of CEPA.
title: Support to CEPA monitoring, implementation and communication

results.summary: EU-Korea Green Partnership Action
results.content: EU-Korea Green Partnership Action

description: Service Contract to facilitate the operationalisation of the EU-Korea Green Partnership. Activities will focus on supporting policy dialogues and practical cooperation on shared policy priorities.Expected outputs will focus on strengthening EU/Member State green diplomacy and outreach in Korea; supporting Korea's just and clean energy transition; enhancing EU-Korea industry cooperation on circular economy approaches; supporting cooperation and exchanges on best practices between EU and Korean cities on green smart city innovations as well as promoting bilateral cooperation on international efforts to fight pollution, protect biodiversity and promote sustainable production, trade and consumption patterns.
title: EU-Korea Green Partnership Action

results.summary: Purchase of Equipment for Practical Training in VET
results.content: Purchase of Equipment for Practical Training in VET

description: This procurement is financed under 2015-2017 Multi-annual Action Programme for Montenegro on Employment, Education and Social Policies (2015/037-895). More specifically, this supply is an integral part of the Activity 2.2 titled Further development of VET curricula in line with the National Qualification Framework. This supply will furnish six VET schools with equipment for practical teaching in sectors of agriculture, electrotechnics/mechatronics and catering. Subject equipment include most important items required in order to provide teachers and students environment to be suitable for ‘learning by doing’.This supply is closely interlinked with the IPA II service contract for development of VET qualifications in line with labour market needs, that is being implemented as of August 2019, as part of Activity 2.2 within Action II of the SOPEES 2015-2017).
title: Purchase of Equipment for Practical Training in VET

results.summary: Technical Assistance to the EU-Indonesia Cooperation Facility (EUICF)
results.content: Technical Assistance to the EU-Indonesia Cooperation Facility (EUICF)

description: The Technical Assistance to EU-Indonesia Cooperation Facility will support policy dialogues, outreach and strategic partnerships on a wide range of issues and with a diversity of stakeholders relevant to EU-Indonesia relations.The Overall Objective (Impact) of this action is to enhance the EU-Indonesia partnership.The Specific Objectives (Outcomes) of this action are to:1. Continue and reinforce EU-Indonesia relations and policy dialogue;2. Promote an increased alignment between EU-Indonesia interests, principles, policies, and values, including human rights and gender equality, with a particular focus on the 2030 Agenda and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs);3. Build increased understanding and awareness of the EU and its role in Indonesia, the region and the world;4. Enhance climate, biodiversity and environmental management, mainstreaming and monitoring, as well as conservation, sustainable, management use and restoration of natural resources.
title: Technical Assistance to the EU-Indonesia Cooperation Facility (EUICF)

results.summary: Apoyo a la consolidación del Sistema de Formación Laboral (SINAFOL) en Guatemala
results.content: Apoyo a la consolidación del Sistema de Formación Laboral (SINAFOL) en Guatemala

description: El trabajo específico de este contrato forma parte de un proceso organizativo institucional en evolución. El Sistema Nacional de Formación Laboral –SINAFOL- se configura como un proceso avanzado, con muchos instrumentos técnicos elaborados que necesitan ser validados por importantes entidades del sector, como Instituto Técnico de Capacitación y Productividad - INTECAP, y progresivamente institucionalizados. Todo esto, con la finalidad de reorganizar la educación técnica profesional publica para que esté más vinculada a las necesidades del mercado laboral, mejorando la empleabilidad. Las acciones previstas responden a las necesidades de consolidación del SINAFOL por un lado y a la necesidad de ir avanzando en sucesivas etapas de desarrollo del Sistema. Para tales fines se abordarán a) los procesos de institucionalización y gobernanza del SINAFOL b) aspectos técnicos y metodológicos, c) planificación/implementación de nuevas etapas y productos, d) implementación de pilotajes.
title: Apoyo a la consolidación del Sistema de Formación Laboral (SINAFOL) en Guatemala

results.summary: Audit indépendant du système (AIS) de vérification de la légalité du système FLEGT République du Congo
results.content: Audit indépendant du système (AIS) de vérification de la légalité du système FLEGT République du Congo

description: Dans le but d'améliorer la gestion durable de ses ressources forestières, la République du Congo s'est engagée en 2008 dans la négociation d'un Accord de Partenariat Volontaire (APV) pour l’application des règlementations forestières, la gouvernance et les échanges commerciaux (FLEGT en acronyme anglais pour Forest Law Enforcement, Governance and Trade) avec l'Union européenne. L'accord est entré officiellement en vigueur le 1er mars 2013. Le système de vérification de la légalité (SVL) de l'APV de la République du Congo est composé de six éléments dont un audit indépendant. Depuis 2015, un Auditeur Indépendant du Système (AIS) est présent en République du Congo dans le but de s'assurer de la performance et de l'efficience du système de vérification de la légalité en cours de mise en œuvre. Le précédent contrat étant arrivé à échéance en 2019, le présent marché vise à mobiliser un nouvel auditeur indépendant.
title: Audit indépendant du système (AIS) de vérification de la légalité du système FLEGT République du Congo

description: As described in the Multi-annual indicative programme (MIP) 2021-2027, and in the context of Global Gateway, the NDICI Cooperation Facility will support the preparation and improve the quality of programming through support to the identification, formulation, implementation, audit and evaluation of actions under the MIP or under other financial instruments implemented by the EU Delegation in South Africa. This flexible facility will lay the ground for future actions, such as through a range of studies, mapping and research and subsequent dissemination, as appropriate, which will be achieved through events, such as conferences, awareness-raising, training, preparation and exchange of lessons learnt and best practices, thus contributing to public diplomacy.The Facility will also help improve and monitor the adequate inclusion of crosscutting issues in the entire portfolio and will allow the Delegation to respond swiftly and with flexibility to ad hoc requirements recurrent in the evo

results.summary: Technical Assistance Facility to Support Sustainable Infrastructure Development in South Africa
results.content: Technical Assistance Facility to Support Sustainable Infrastructure Development in South Africa

description: The purpose of this contract is provision of technical assistance to improve policy and regulatory environment and institutional framework for stimulation of innovative technical and financing models for sustainable infrastructure development within all three spheres of government in South Africa – national, provincial and local. The contractor is deliver practical and effective technical assistance to support the realisation of three Expected Outputs (EO) 1 – 3.EO 1: Improved policy, strategy and regulatory framework, including the analytical – evidence base for sustainable infrastructure delivery;EO 2: Enhanced capacities, training programmes and expertise resources for evidence-based planning and implementation of innovative financing strategies and environmentally friendly, sustainable and resilient infrastructure;EO 3: Improved coordination, planning, implementation and accountability mechanisms for infrastructure delivery and alignment with NDP and Agenda 2030.
title: Technical Assistance Facility to Support Sustainable Infrastructure Development in South Africa

results.content: Assistance technique à la mise en œuvre du programme en appui à l’émancipation de la femme et lutte contre la violence basée sur le genre - Madagascar

description: L’action vise à favoriser l’autonomisation des femmes à Madagascar, notamment remédier à l’absence de voix, de choix, de moyens et à la violence basée sur le genre. Ses objectifs spécifiques sont:1) améliorer la prévention et la lutte contre toutes les formes de violences à l’égard des femmes et des filles;2) accroître la participation des femmes dans les domaines politique, social, économique et publique.Les services consisteront principalement en une assistance technique de long terme et une mobilisation d’experts court terme pour la mise en œuvre, la coordination et le suivi-évaluation du programme et l’appui au Ministère de la population, de la protection sociale et de la promotion de la femme (MPPSPF).
title: Assistance technique à la mise en œuvre du programme en appui à l’émancipation de la femme et lutte contre la violence basée sur le genre - Madagascar

The technical assistance (TA) team is expected to assist the Uganda Coffee Development Authority who act as the supervisor of the project, in implementing the project efficiently and effectively through strengthening the human resource and technical capacity. Furthermore, the TA will ensure the delivery of the project's result areas to the public and private beneficiaries of improving the policy and regulatory frameworks and their implementation; enhancing production and productivity; as well as improving the post-harvest handling and marketing. Various contracts involving services and supplies are envisaged to be implemented through indirect management mode with various private and public sector institutions.

results.summary: Communication et actions de diplomatie publique de l’Union européenne en Côte d’Ivoire
results.content: Communication et actions de diplomatie publique de l’Union européenne en Côte d’Ivoire

description: Le présent marché vise à permettre au grand public ivoirien de mieux connaître et comprendre le partenariat entre l’Union européenne et la Côte d’Ivoire, les valeurs communes et partagées sur lesquelles il repose et qui justifient les actions de l’UE en Côte d’Ivoire. Il s’agira en particulier, pour le contractant, d’améliorer la visibilité des actions de l’UE en Côte d’Ivoire, et en particulier de leur impact sur les conditions de vie de leurs bénéficiaires. Ainsi, en partant de la stratégie de communication de la Délégation de l’UE en Côte d’Ivoire, le contractant devra élaborer un plan d’action, organiser des activités de diplomatie publique, relayer les activités de la Délégation et de l’ambassadeur sur les réseaux sociaux, accroître la présence médiatique de la Délégation de l’UE, de ses projets et de l’ambassadeur et organiser des campagnes thématiques à l’occasion de journées internationales.
title: Communication et actions de diplomatie publique de l’Union européenne en Côte d’Ivoire

results.summary: Technical Assistance for Development of End-of-Waste Concept in Turkey
results.content: Technical Assistance for Development of End-of-Waste Concept in Turkey

description: The overall objective of this project is to reduce depletion of natural resources used in production processes and amount of waste generated by promoting usage of secondary raw materials and enhancing market for high quality recyclables. In order to contribute to the sustainable development, the contract will include technical assistance and institutional capacity building activities for identification and effective implementation of end-of-waste criteria for specific waste streams. Mainly, current situation in Turkey will be assessed by means of demanding sectors of waste streams such as metal, scrap, glass cullet, copper scrap, waste paper, biodegradable waste, waste plastic, textile waste etc. Besides, draft technical regulations on establishing criteria determining when certain types of materials cease to be waste, will be prepared compatible with Turkish context. Also guiding documents as draft regulations, roadmap and guidelines will be composed as the national strategy.
title: Technical Assistance for Development of End-of-Waste Concept in Turkey

results.summary: Support to EU Arctic policy
results.content: Support to EU Arctic policy

description: This action aims to support the implementation of EU new policy for the Arctic.This contract shall allow the EU to consolidate further its presence and visibility on the global scale and in international processes on different Arctic strategic priorities (e.g. tackling climate change and environmental degradation, transport, connectivity, sustainable economic development including raw materials, research and innovation, science diplomacy, security and defence, energy, maritime security and safety, health security or ocean governance). It will also aim to support the promotion of EU interests, standards and values, and enhance EU’s role as a key actor. The action will include two components:1. A policy support facility for a peaceful, sustainable and prosperous Arctic, which will act in a flexible way to respond quickly to emerging needs.2. Support to EU-Arctic Urban/Regional cooperation through exchanges of knowledge and best practices with a peer-to-peer approach.
title: Support to EU Arctic policy

Elle le fera appuyé par un certain nombre d’experts (et d’éventuels sous-traitants) et du staff de l’unité de gestion de projet qui seront tou.tes contracté.es dans le cadre d’un devis-programme.Pour l’encadrement technique des OSCs, il sera important d’utiliser la main d’œuvre et le savoir-faire déjà existant auprès de certaines OSC haïtiennes déjà expérimentées. The overall objective of this action is to increase the benefits for the target population, including women, of the human development aspects of our programmes at global, regional and country level. Its specific objective is to increase the effectiveness of the human development aspects of EU programmes at global, regional and country level. This procedure will be divided in 3 lots: Lot 1 - 'Knowledge Hub for expertise on Gender equality, Disability and Human Rights Based Approach (HRBA)'; Lot 2 - 'Knowledge Hub for expertise on Health, Social Protection and Socio-Economic inequalities'; Lot 3: 'Knowledge Hub for expertise on Youth'.

results.summary: Fourniture de machines à facturation électronique de la TVA en République Centrafricaine
results.content: Fourniture de machines à facturation électronique de la TVA en République Centrafricaine

description: Introduction de la machine à facturation électronique de la TVA en République Centrafricaine. L’installation du Système de caisse enregistreuse pour le présent marché devra prendre en compte trois éléments devant être agréés par l’administration fiscale Centrafricaine, la Direction Générale des Impôts et des domaines (DGID): il y a d’abord le système de caisse, c’est-à-dire la caisse ou l’ordinateur contenant le logiciel de caisse . A cela, il faut ajouter un module de contrôle fiscal, appelé boîte noire , qui devra être connecté en permanence au système de caisse. Enfin, une carte d’activation personnalisée, qui doit être introduite dans la boîte noire.Une fois en place, le nouveau système de caisse enregistreuse doit permettre d’enregistrer automatiquement toutes transactions commerciales, modifications de commande comprises, via la boîte noire ; Les données stockées dans la boîte noire sont ensuite transférées automatiquement vers Systémif (Système informatique fiscal) de la RCA.
title: Fourniture de machines à facturation électronique de la TVA en République Centrafricaine

description: To prepare a detailed Implementation plan for the National Transport Strategy 2018-2030 with supporting system and tools for its monitoring based on developing Appraisal framework for actions and to conduct trainings and workshops for the institutions in the transport sector responsible for the implementation of the measures in the National Transport Strategy. The project foresees also development of a Project preparation framework with a prepared Project preparation manual. Additionally, an IT tool should be developed that should allow proper monitoring and data collection regarding the NTS 2018-2030 performance indicators and the reporting procedure. Workshops and trainings will be conducted for the staff responsible for the monitoring of the implementation of the NTS from all relevant institutions.

results.summary: SCADA Platform for DSO
results.content: SCADA Platform for DSO

description: Contract should secure procurement and installation of new SCADA system customized for DSO, training for operators during SCADA installation period and new SCADA system testing period. Procurement is composed of the following:- Procurement of the necessary hardware- Procurement of the necessary software - System Operations Platform- Operational training Furthermore, this contract shall contribute to the reduction of gas losses, more efficient operation of gas network, more accurate balancing of gas system and finally lower tariffs for users. At the outcome level it is expected that the action will lead to increased quality and security of gas supply though the monitoring of flow parameters, reduced number of supply interruptions and shortening the response time in case of intervention needed.
title: SCADA Platform for DSO

results.summary: Technical Assistance for Enhancement of MENR's Heating and Cooling Capacity
results.content: Technical Assistance for Enhancement of MENR's Heating and Cooling Capacity

description: The contract aims to enhance Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources’ capacity for planning andimplementation, measurement and monitoring on energy efficient heating and cooling sector. Activitiesunder this contract includes among others: preparing of national strategy, policy and guidelines on heatingand cooling sector and the identification of policy gaps on EU regulations; enabling sector coupling withelectrification, energy storage and renewable energy sources by preparation oflegislative recommendations,a roadmap and guidelines for sector coupling of heating & cooling by electrification and energy storage;conducting site visits, workshops, trainings and other visibility and awareness raising activities with bothprofessionals and end users; preparing feasibility studies across different regions of Türkiye; establishingmonitoring system for sustainable data collection for heating and cooling
title: Technical Assistance for Enhancement of MENR's Heating and Cooling Capacity

results.summary: Upgrading capacity to control air quality in the Turkish Cypriot community
results.content: Upgrading capacity to control air quality in the Turkish Cypriot community

description: The overall objective of the project is to maximise the degree of convergence and compatibility of the air quality sector in the Turkish Cypriot community with EU legislation, as well strengthening fuel quality controls. This will be done partly through the development of standard operating procedures and hands-on training on air quality measurements and instrument verification, with the aim to comply with the EU reference methods. Equally, the contract envisages other activities related to pollution characterisation and air quality management.
title: Upgrading capacity to control air quality in the Turkish Cypriot community

results.summary: Strategic Communication and Public Diplomacy Facility
results.content: Strategic Communication and Public Diplomacy Facility

description: The service contract will support the Delegation implement communication and public diplomacy actions in Somalia aimed at:• Promoting understanding and awareness of the EU values, principles, interests and specific policies, including human rights, foreign and security policy, science and research, gender equality, green deal, digitalisation, Team Europe visibility, fight against disinformation, as well its multilateral agenda. • Increasing the profile, awareness, understanding and approval of the EU’s partnership with Somalia, by focusing on and showcasing the comprehensive EU support and development cooperation.• Strengthening networks and long-term relationships with key target audiences and partners (e.g. youth, students, academics, think tanks, CSOs, business, creative industries), including leveraging existing EU programmes, in order to facilitate future cooperation across policy areas.
title: Strategic Communication and Public Diplomacy Facility

results.summary: Construction of Gas Interconnector Serbia – Bulgaria on the Serbian Territory
results.content: Construction of Gas Interconnector Serbia – Bulgaria on the Serbian Territory

description: The Works include construction of the bi-directional magistral gas interconnector MG10 Niš – Dimitrovgrad on the Serbian territory, between the natural gas systems of Serbia and Bulgaria. The gas pipe is approximately 109 km long, DN700, and has working pressure of 55 bar. The Works also include four metering regulating stations and accompanying facilities.
title: Construction of Gas Interconnector Serbia – Bulgaria on the Serbian Territory

results.summary: MacroFiscal Facility
results.content: MacroFiscal Facility

description: Provide support, trainings and technical expertise to the Directorate General International Partnerships (DG INTPA), including staff in EU Delegations, Headquarters, and in partner countries regarding macro-fiscal issues. This would include knowledge sharing, policy analysis and the development of tailored policy recommendations.
title: MacroFiscal Facility

results.summary: Sustainable Urban Mobility for Trabzon
results.content: Sustainable Urban Mobility for Trabzon

description: The purpose of the contract is to adopt a Sustainable Urban Mobility Plan (SUMP) for Trabzon in line with the European Union best practice.The Contract shall be based on; but not necessarily be limited to:• Analysis and scoping,• Strategy development for the SUMP,• Measure planning,• Capacity building and trainings,• Publicity and visibility activities,• Supervision of works for bicycle road.
title: Sustainable Urban Mobility for Trabzon

results.summary: External Legal Counsel Services for EFSD+ Guarantee Agreements
results.content: External Legal Counsel Services for EFSD+ Guarantee Agreements

description: The new European Fund for Sustainable Development Plus (EFSD+), builds on the European Fund for Sustainable Development (EFSD) as established by Regulation (EU) 2017/1601, constitutes an integrated financial package supplying financing capacity in the form of grants, technical assistance, financial instruments, budgetary guarantees and blending operations worldwide. The EFSD+ includes budgetary guarantee operations covered by the External Action Guarantee. The contractor is required to provide legal advice during the negotiation of Guarantee agreements stemming from EFSD + implementation. The contractor shall also produce the term sheets for the EFSD + Guarantees, and draft individual guarantee agreements as well as their potential amendments.
title: External Legal Counsel Services for EFSD+ Guarantee Agreements

results.summary: Technical Assistance for the 11th EDF Intra-ACP Natural Disaster Risk Reduction Programme ACP/FED/2020/041-233
results.content: Technical Assistance for the 11th EDF Intra-ACP Natural Disaster Risk Reduction Programme ACP/FED/2020/041-233

description: The contract will involve the setting up of a technical assistance (TA) Facility to provide high-level technical support and policy advice to the Secretariat of the OACPS, for the implementation of the 11th EDF Natural Disaster Risk Reduction (NDRR) programme. The TA will support the Secretariat of the OACPS in fulfilling its overall coordination, monitoring and evaluation, knowledge management, knowledge creation, visibility, and communication functions, as well as supporting recovery processes in post disaster contexts.The TA will be mandated to providing specific analytical work (technical studies, policy notes, research papers, amongst others) in support of the implementation of the 11th EDF NDRR Programme on a demand driven basis.
title: Technical Assistance for the 11th EDF Intra-ACP Natural Disaster Risk Reduction Programme ACP/FED/2020/041-233

results.summary: EU4SPORT - To foster positive social development through improvement of the sports infrastructure in schools
results.content: EU4SPORT - To foster positive social development through improvement of the sports infrastructure in schools

description: Modernization/renovation of the sport halls in primary schools and Faculty of sports is planned. The main goal of intervention is to create the optimal spatial conditions for physical education in schools to be conducted in a professional, high-quality and safe manner. This will further result not only in developing motor skills and acquiring knowledge of sports, but also in shaping the personality and relationships between individuals, as well as in channeling the energy of young people in socially useful direction. In addition to the role of gyms in the teaching process, the role of sports is irreplaceable in the promotion of healthy life, in the promotion of socialization of youth as well as in the promotion of social inclusion policies and reconciliation processes.
title: EU4SPORT - To foster positive social development through improvement of the sports infrastructure in schools
